mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tutou_th_landarea_new_tb ( id, source_id, land_id, land_num, land_area, construction_use_land, land_nature_id, aboveground_planning, building_limit, greening_rate, planning_density, construction_area_a, planning_rate, matching, parking_ratio, traffic, municipal, location, format_ratio, single_family_villas, courtyard_house, stacked_townhouse, villa, ordinary_house, super_high_rise, guarantee_room, return_room, on_ground_other, residential_air_defen, mansion_air_defense, non_common_house_civil, no_residential_air_defen, mansion_non_air_defense, no_mansion_air_defense, commercial_civil_air_defe, commercial_non_civil_air_defe, underground_commer, underground_office, underground_storage, installation_room, underground_other, commercial_street, office_building, flat_flat, loft, on_ground_business_other, residence, hotel, shopping_mall, holding_office_building, holding_other, civil_air_defense_garag, non_civil_air_defense_garag, holding_down_other, public_construction, school, hospital, public_matching_other, acreage_on_ground_area, underground_grant_area, gift_area_other, type, confirm_status, confirm_value, confirm_date, confirm_person, confirm_num, current_shares_rate, is_write,create_time ) VALUES
( #{item.id},#{item.sourceId},#{item.landId},#{item.landNum},#{item.landArea},#{item.constructionUseLand}, #{item.landNatureId},#{item.abovegroundPlanning},#{item.buildingLimit},#{item.greeningRate}, #{item.planningDensity},#{item.constructionAreaA},#{item.planningRate},#{item.matching}, #{item.parkingRatio},#{item.traffic},#{item.municipal},#{item.location},#{item.formatRatio}, #{item.singleFamilyVillas},#{item.courtyardHouse},#{item.stackedTownhouse},#{item.villa}, #{item.ordinaryHouse},#{item.superHighRise},#{item.guaranteeRoom},#{item.returnRoom}, #{item.onGroundOther},#{item.residentialAirDefen},#{item.mansionAirDefense},#{item.nonCommonHouseCivil}, #{item.noResidentialAirDefen},#{item.mansionNonAirDefense},#{item.noMansionAirDefense}, #{item.commercialCivilAirDefe},#{item.commercialNonCivilAirDefe},#{item.undergroundCommer}, #{item.undergroundOffice},#{item.undergroundStorage},#{item.installationRoom},#{item.undergroundOther}, #{item.commercialStreet},#{item.officeBuilding},#{item.flatFlat},#{item.loft},#{item.onGroundBusinessOther}, #{item.residence},#{item.hotel},#{item.shoppingMall},#{item.holdingOfficeBuilding},#{item.holdingOther}, #{item.civilAirDefenseGarag},#{item.nonCivilAirDefenseGarag},#{item.holdingDownOther}, #{item.publicConstruction},#{item.school},#{item.hospital},#{item.publicMatchingOther}, #{item.acreageOnGroundArea},#{item.undergroundGrantArea},#{item.giftAreaOther},#{item.type}, #{item.confirmStatus},#{item.confirmValue},#{item.confirmDate},#{item.confirmPerson}, #{item.confirmNum},#{item.currentSharesRate},#{item.isWrite},#{item.createTime} )
